NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
PERSONNEL POlICY STATEMENT
Promotions and Salary Increases
Vacancies occurring, for any reason, shall, where practicable,
be filled by promoting a person already employed by the NAEB;
provided, that such person shall be fully qualified to fill the
position vacated.
Salary increases normally will be given at the start of the
fiscal year (July 1), except that increases may be awarded at
other times when deemed advisable. Based on merit and length
of service,salary increases normally will be given to each em¬
ployee each year, and such increases normally shall be between
5% and 10% of the employeeTs current salary. However, finan¬
cial considerations, ability and attitude of the employee, or
other considerations may limit the amount and frequency of
salary increases, and nothing in this section should be con¬
strued as a guarantee that such increases will be forthcoming.
Insurance
Each employee is covered for Workmenrs Compansation by a policy
carried by the Association, except those NAEB employees em¬
ployed through the University of Illinois who are covered by
the University.
All employees in the Urbana office, whether actually employed
through the University of Illinois or not, are eligible to
buy health insurance under the University1s group policy.
Regular employees (as well as the Board of Directors) are
covered by a travel accident policy which provides for benefits
in the case of accidental death or injury while travelling out¬
side the city of employment on NAEB business. The coverage
for the President and Administrative Vice President covers 24
hours a day, whether on NAEB business or not. Each employee
may designate his or her own beneficiary by filling out a form
provided by the NAEB.
Retirement Benefits
Each employee employed through the University of Illinois be¬
comes a participant in the University Retirement System. For
such employees the Association shall contribute to the Retire¬
ment System such amounts as are required by the System; each
such employee shall likewise contribute the amount specified
by the Retirement System.
